comment.author: 15626998@N06
comment._content:
I really enjoyed seeing this!
Have you come across a photo of Rocks Ferry further down the river - I have great memories of crossing the punt as a child to visit my grandma. (rather exciting way to finish a long drive from Sydney) And I remember the years that we had to come across Bain's bridge while the new Rocks Ferry bridge was built.
